other_conditions: Desolvated NOTT-300 was loaded with pure C2H4 to generate NOTT-300·1C2H4 at room temperature before the sample cell was isolated, sealed and cooled down to below 10 K.
Desolvated NOTT-300 was loaded with an equimolar mixture of C2H2 and C2H4 at room temperature before the sample cell was isolated, sealed and cooled down to below 10 K.

conditions.equipment: Beamline I11 of Diamond Light Source
conditions.time: 30-60 minutes to equilibrate before collection of the PXRD pattern
other_conditions: The final PXRD pattern was collected after a final degassing at 373 K and under vacuum for ~40 minute to remove adsorbed C2H2.

conditions.equipment: Beamline I11 of Diamond Light Source
conditions.time: 30-60 minutes to equilibrate before collection of the PXRD pattern
other_conditions: The final PXRD pattern was collected after a final degassing at 373 K and under vacuum for ~40 minute to remove adsorbed C2H4.

conditions.equipment: WISH diffractometer at the ISIS Facility
other_conditions: The loadings of C2D2 were performed by volumetric method at room temperature.

conditions.equipment: WISH diffractometer at the ISIS Facility
other_conditions: The loadings of C2D4 were performed by volumetric method at room temperature.
